info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 9:34AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...AND WYOMING COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 933 AM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Silver Creek to Java Center, and slowly shifting south. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden, Westfield, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Angola, Arcade, Franklinville, North Collins, Chaffee, SUNY Fredonia, North Boston, Ashford Hollow, Lake Erie State Park and Derby. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 60 and 57A. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
